name: The Cafe at 3am
description:
Subscribe to my YouTube for some cool gamedev content!

https://m.youtube.com/channel/UCJnJmQzCqb-SIlY_UbUM7zg
Survive through the 3 levels against various demons by serving them coffee.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Rotate

E - Fill up Coffee cup (When near station)

Left mouse - Throw coffee cup (When full)
